title: Natural Madd
desc1_desc: Madd (مَدّ) refers to 'extending' or 'prolonging' a sound. It occurs when a madd letter follows a letter that has its corresponding vowel sound attached, causing the sound to be elongated. The reader is required to lengthen the letter preceding the madd letter for 2 beats, where one beat is the duration it takes to pronounce a single letter without elongation.

Lessons.name: Madd Asli (Natural Elongation)
Lessons.pengertian: Natural elongation, categorized into three types:
categories: The letter ا when combined with Fatha.
The letter ي when combined with Kasrah.
The letter و when combined with Dhammah.
